Package eu.cqse.check.framework.scanner

Provides scanners for several languages that can be obtained in a strict or in a lenient variant.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ILenientScanner
    Lenient scanner that, in contrast to IScanner, does not throw ScannerExceptions for unrecognized characters, but returns tokens of token class ETokenType.ETokenClass.ERROR and resumes scanning.
    IScanner
    Common interface for all scanners.
    IStatementOracle
    Statement oracles detect statement boundaries.
    IToken
    Object of type IToken are returned by the scanners.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CobolStatementOracle
    IStatementOracle for Cobol.
    ScannerFactory
    This factory class is the central access point to the scanner framework.
    ScannerUtils
    This class offers utility methods for scanners.
    StrictScanner
    Wrapps an ILenientScanner and converts tokens of ETokenType.ETokenClass.ERROR into ScannerExceptions.
    SyntaxHighlightingViewFactory
    View factory to be used with CCSM scanners.
    Token
    Base class for implementations of the token interface.
    TokenEquator
    A class for testing tokens for equality with respect to type and content.
    TokenListLookahead
    ILookahead on Lists of ITokens
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ELanguage
    Enumeration class for the languages support by the scanner framework.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ScannerException
    Generated scanners throw exceptions of this description to signal scanning problems.

Package eu.cqse.check.framework.scanner Description

Provides scanners for several languages that can be obtained in a strict or in a lenient variant. The variants differ in the way they handle unrecognized characters.
Strict scanners implement interface org.conqat.lib.scanner.IScanner and throw org.conqat.lib.scanner.ScannerExceptions for unrecognized input and abort scanning.
Lenient scanners implement interface org.conqat.lib.scanner.ILenientScanner and do not throw exceptions, but return tokens of token class org.conqat.lib.scanner.ETokenType.ETokenClass#ERROR and resume scanning.

Besides, the central elements of the package are:
  • org.conqat.lib.scanner.ScannerFactory from which scanners can be obtained
  • org.conqat.lib.scanner.ELanguage the enumeration that lists all supported languages
  • org.conqat.lib.scanner.IToken the interface that is implemented by all tokens
